description: Aarong is one of Bangladesh's leading lifestyle retail chains offering ethnic clothing, home decor, and accessories.

coupons.description: Get 15% off on your next clothing purchase.
Free shipping on orders over BDT 1500.
coupons.condition: No minimum order for registered users.

description: Daraz is the leading online shopping platform in Bangladesh, offering everything from electronics to fashion and groceries.

coupons.description: Free shipping on orders over BDT 1000.
coupons.condition: No minimum order required for select sellers.

description: Bengal Meat is a trusted provider of premium quality meat and poultry products in Bangladesh.

coupons.description: Get BDT 50 off on orders over BDT 500.
Free delivery on orders over BDT 1000.
coupons.condition: Free delivery for Dhaka and Chittagong city.

description: IDLC Finance is a leading financial services provider offering personal loans, credit cards, and investment solutions.

coupons.description: Get BDT 2000 off on loan processing fees.
coupons.condition: Available for new personal loan customers.

coupons.description: Free financial consultation for new customers.

description: Pran is a popular Bangladeshi food and beverage brand known for offering a wide variety of snacks, juices, and frozen foods.

coupons.description: Get 10% off on any Pran product purchase.
Save BDT 500 on orders over BDT 3000.
coupons.condition: Applies to all frozen foods and beverages.

description: Sena Kalyan Sangstha provides a wide range of services including retail, healthcare, education, and real estate management.

coupons.description: Get a 10% discount on medical services for veterans and their families.
coupons.condition: Only for veterans and their families.

coupons.description: Free consultation for new real estate clients.

description: Banglalink is one of the leading mobile operators in Bangladesh, offering competitive data plans, calling rates, and digital services.

coupons.description: Get 15% off on your first data plan purchase.
Get 1GB of free internet with every recharge of BDT 500.
coupons.condition: Applicable on recharge of BDT 500 or more.

description: Robi is a major telecom operator in Bangladesh offering a wide range of mobile services, including internet, calling, and digital solutions.

coupons.description: Get 1GB of free data on recharges of BDT 200 or more.

description: Gadget & Gear offers the latest electronic gadgets, mobile accessories, and tech solutions in Bangladesh.

coupons.description: Get 10% off on all tech gadgets.
coupons.condition: Valid on electronics and gadgets only.

coupons.description: Free shipping on orders over BDT 1500.
coupons.condition: No minimum order for registered users.
